revised_title: Middle Atmosphere Observations and Research: A Historical Overview
tldr: This article provides an introduction to the study of the middle atmosphere, including its history, key observations, and major research topics. It highlights the importance of understanding the complex interplay between radiation, dynamics, and chemistry in the middle atmosphere, as well as the need for increased observations and modeling to improve our knowledge of this fascinating scientific discipline. The article also discusses the potential impact of human activities on the ozone layer and the development of a Middle Atmosphere Programme to address these concerns.
